DOC.brief_summary: ANGPTL3 ANGPTL8 emerge molecule involve lipid metabolism . In previous vivo study use mouse , ANGPTL8 regulate activation ANGPTL3 know inhibit lipoprotein lipase activity stimulate lipolysis adipose tissue . Besides , glypican 4 identify novel adipokine modulate adipocyte differentiation . Thus , investigator postulate different serum concentration ANGPTL3 , ANGPTL8 glypican 4 might affect progression obesity child . The investigator measure molecules Korean child , investigate association molecule development obesity .
DOC.brief_title: Serum ANGPTL3 , ANGPTL8 Glypican 4 Concentrations Relation Development Obesity Korean Children
DOC.detailed_description: Participants study select Korean Metabolic disorder & Obesity Study Elementary School child ( KMOSES ) , main aim comprehensively assess obesity-related metabolic risk factor evaluate clinical outcome Korean child prospectively . Korean child participate school-based health examination , reexamine 3-year follow-up assessment .
DOC.criteria: Participants reexamine 3 year followup assessment Participants available 3 year follow assessment
